scripts.prepublishOnly: coffee -c *.coffee; echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - k.js > k.sh; echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - repl.js > repl.sh;
scripts.all: coffee -c *.coffee; npm run prepare; npm run prepublishOnly
scripts.test: coffee -c symbol-table.coffee; jiwson parser.jison; coffee test.coffee
